column4: How do I force eject the cd rom dirver... the button doesn't open the drive and ubuntu say's there probably isn't a cd in the drive, but there is
you probably need to umount it. if not, you can always just reboot
thanks i know i can reboot, but I hate how ubuntu takes control of the eject button on the cd rom driver... i was trying to eject it without restarting
I can understand software eject, but if you hit the eject button on the cd rom drive it should eject if there's a cd in there or not
